titles.title: Keep Buying American Act of 2018
A bill to require publication of the annual reports required under the Presidential Order on Buy American and Hire American.
Keep Buying American Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Keep Buying American Act of 2018
This bill directs each agency required to submit reports under Executive Order 13788, titled "Buy American and Hire American," to make each report available to the public and Congress at the same time it submits the report to the Department of Commerce and the Office of Management and Budget.
Each agency that was previously required to submit a report under such order shall make each report available to the public and to Congress.
